videos.title: Grinduro Canada 2021 Hosted by EVIL
videos.description:
400 million years ago, a meteorite hit the Canadian Shield and its Laurentian massif here in Charlevoix. It is this phenomenal shock that created the breathtaking landscapes and rugged terrain that make the Charlevoix region famous, and a place that delights (or tortures) cyclists.

It is thus no surprise that we chose Saint-Urbain-de-Charlevoix, to host Grinduro Canada. But what exactly is a Grinduro? It’s a combo of a gravel grinder road race and an enduro: one long loop on all kinds of terrain, where finishing times aren’t based on overall loop time, but four timed segments.

videos.title: Grinduro, une tandence qui grandie !   REPORTAGE
